title: Update Hero profile photo src to provided LinkedIn URL

requirements.summary: Replace the Hero section profile image src with the provided LinkedIn image URL without changing any other Hero content or styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section profile image loads from the provided LinkedIn URL and visually replaces the previous photo.
No other Hero content (name, title, summary, CTA buttons) changes as part of this update.
The profile image remains circular (rounded-full) and keeps its existing sizing and border styling.

file_operations.description: Update the src in the Hero section to exactly: https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_200_200/B4DZw8fRO0HwAY-/0/1770541359476?e=1772064000&v=beta&t=LliVE_e8O6KDOE8oCWLvaWL8Vnm5WhGNfogpC7gsdaU. Keep all existing alt text, className (rounded-full, sizing, border, shadow, object-cover), and all other Hero content unchanged.
